# text

**Instance Property**

Text to show in a label on the button.

## Declaration

```swift
var text: LocalizedStringResource
```

## Creating a button

- **init(text:textColor:systemImageName:)**: Creates an alarm button.
- **systemImageName**: The name of the icon you use on the button.
- **textColor**: The color for the text on the button.
